decision_conditions:
<p><span id="docs-internal-guid-d78b4516-7fff-2469-3f56-e5ad9227e7d8"><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space-collapse: preserve;">The development shall not be undertaken otherwise than in full accordance with the screening details approved for condition 13 under 2022/1862:</span></span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-d78b4516-7fff-2469-3f56-e5ad9227e7d8"><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space-collapse: preserve;">- Part A Construction Management Plan</span></span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-d78b4516-7fff-2469-3f56-e5ad9227e7d8"><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space-collapse: preserve;">- </span></span><span style="background-color: transparent; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 10.5pt; white-space-collapse: preserve;">Part B Construction Management Plan</span></p><p>REASON: To ensure that during demolition and construction works that there would be no negative
highway impacts arise as a result of the development. These details are required prior to
commencement as they are affect the entirety of the construction phase and cannot therefore be
dealt with retrospectively<br></p>

<p>The Development hereby permitted shall only be carried out and completed
strictly in accordance with the submitted plans hereby approved and any subsequent
approval of details.
</p><p>REASON: To ensure that the development hereby permitted is carried out in full
accordance with the plans hereby approved<br></p>

<p>Prior to any above ground works associated with the construction phase of the development, full details, with samples, of the materials to be used on the external surfaces of the buildings, including glazing and all boundary treatments, shall be submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority in writing before any above ground work on the site is commenced. The development shall not be carried out otherwise than in accordance with the details thus approved.</p><p>REASON: To ensure that the external appearance of the building is satisfactory and does not detract from the character and visual amenity of the area. These details are required prior to commencement of any above ground works as they are integral to the fabric of the development and cannot therefore be dealt with retrospectively.</p>

<p><span id="docs-internal-guid-fb3bce37-7fff-b3f1-366e-ac9df9dfd6ef"><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space-collapse: preserve;">The development shall not be undertaken otherwise than in full accordance with the window details approved for condition 18 under 2023/2355:</span></span></p><p>-&nbsp;2 2 2 7 - P 6 0 2 - S 2 - P 0</p><p>REASON: To protect the safe and efficient operation of the railway.</p>

<p>Prior to any above ground works associated with the construction phase of the development, a scaffolding plan, risk assessment, method statement and design details (including certification) shall be submitted to, and approved in writing, by the Local Planning Authority.</p><p>Construction works must then be carried out in accordance with the details hereby approved.</p><p>REASON: To protect the safe and efficient operation of the railway during the construction phase of the development.</p><div><br></div>

<p>No vibro-compaction machinery is to be used in the development unless details
of the use of such machinery and a method statement have been submitted to and
approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority in consultation with RfL. The use
of such vibro-compaction machinery shall only be carried out in accordance with the
approved method statement.
</p><p>REASON: To protect the safe operation of the railway.<br></p>

<p>The development shall not be undertaken otherwise than in full accordance with the screening details approved for condition 12 under 2023/2355:</p><p>-&nbsp;2 2 2 7 - P 6 0 7 - S 2 - P 0</p><p>REASON: In the interests of providing adequate waste and recycling facilities<br></p>

<p>Detailed drawings/full particulars of the proposed development showing the
matters set out below must be submitted to and approved by the Local Planning
Authority, in writing, before work is commenced on the relevant part of the
development. The development shall not be carried out otherwise than in
accordance with the details thus approved.
</p><p>a: Full details of the mechanical ventilation system</p><p>REASON: To ensure that all residential accommodation is not unduly effected by its
proximity to the railway line to the east.<br></p>

<p>No soil stacks, soil vent pipes, flues, ductwork or any other pipework shall be
fixed to the (street) elevations of the building other than as shown on the drawings
hereby approved.
</p><p>REASON: To ensure that the external appearance of the building is satisfactory and
does not detract from the character and visual amenity of the area.<br></p>

<p>The development shall not be undertaken otherwise than in full accordance with
the recommendations contained within the submitted noise and vibration
assessment in terms of sound insulation, glazing and ventilation, unless otherwise
agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority.
</p><p>REASON: To safeguard the amenity of future occupiers of the site.<br></p>

The development hereby permitted must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning 18/10/2022 (original planning application 2018/4713)

REASON: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 as amended.

<p>Before occupation/use of the development a post-development verification
report will be produced to the satisfaction of and approved in writing by the Local
Planning Authority. The verification report must fully set out any restrictions on the
future use of a development and demonstrate that arrangements have been made to
inform future site users of the restrictions. Work shall be completed and reporting
produced by a competent person/company in line with current best practice
guidance, including the Council's contaminated land planning guidance. The Local
Planning Authority must receive written notification at least five days before
development and remedial works commence. Subject to written approval by the
Planning Authority, this condition may be varied, or discharged in agreed phases.
Any additional, or unforeseen contamination encountered during the course of
development shall be immediately notified to the Local Planning Authority. All
development shall cease in the affected area. Any additional or unforeseen
contamination shall be dealt with as agreed with the Local Planning Authority.
Where development has ceased in the affected area, it shall only recommence upon
written notification of the Local Planning Authority.</p><p>REASON: To ensure that potential contamination risks are identified and suitable
remediation is agreed. These details are required prior to commencement as they
are integral to the suitability of the proposal and cannot therefore be dealt with
retrospectively.<br></p>

<p>Prior to any works requiring crane/lifting, a crane/lifting management
plan shall be submitted to, and approved in writing, by the Local Planning Authority.
Details would include crane base design (including certification) risk assessment and
method statement for siting, erection, lifting arrangements, operational procedure
(including any radio communications), jacking up, derigging in addition to plans for
loads, radius, slew restrictions and collapse radius.<br></p><p>Construction works must be carried out with the details approved.</p><p>REASON: To protect the safe and efficient operation of the railway. These details
are required prior to commencement as they are affect the entirety of the
construction phase and cannot therefore be dealt with retrospectively.<br></p>

<p><span id="docs-internal-guid-2fa8e90c-7fff-5539-6f79-c9ce1930fe49"><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space-collapse: preserve;">The development shall not be undertaken otherwise than in full accordance with the biodiverse roof details approved for condition 25 under 2023/2355:</span></span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-2fa8e90c-7fff-5539-6f79-c9ce1930fe49"><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space-collapse: preserve;">- 2 2 2 7 - P 6 0 9 - S 2 - P 2</span></span><br></p><p>REASON: In the interests the promotion of sustainable forms of development and
construction and biodiversity<br></p>

<p>The window(s) identified as 'permanently frosted' on the drawings hereby
approved shall be permanently glazed in obscured glass and kept fixed shut to a
height of 1.8m from finished floor level.
</p><p>REASON: In the interests of the privacy of surrounding occupiers and those within
the development hereby approved.<br></p>

<p><span id="docs-internal-guid-bad479cb-7fff-23ff-ea11-90c6e41fc77d"><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space-collapse: preserve;">The development shall not be undertaken otherwise than in full accordance with the swift box details approved for condition 23 under 2023/2355:</span></span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-bad479cb-7fff-23ff-ea11-90c6e41fc77d"><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space-collapse: preserve;">- 2 2 2 7 - P 6 0 8 - S 2 - P 0</span></span><br></p><p>REASON: To provide potential habitats for local wildlife, in line with the
recommendations of the submitted habitat survey.<br></p>

<p>All non-CHP space and hot water fossil fuel (or equivalent hydrocarbon based fuel) boilers installed as part of the development must achieve dry NOx emission levels equivalent to or less than 40 mg/kWh.</p><p>REASON: To protect air quality and human health by ensuring that the production of air pollutants, such as nitrogen dioxide and particulate matter, are kept to a minimum during the lifetime of the development, and to contribute towards the maintenance or to prevent further exceedances of National Air Quality Objectives.</p>

<p>The development hereby approved shall not be carried out otherwise than in accordance with the measures recommended within the Sustainable Design and Construction Statement dated December 2018 prepared by lump.studio hereby approved which shall be completed in full prior to the first occupation of the development and retained in perpetuity.</p><p>REASON: In the interests of the promotion of sustainable forms of development and construction.</p>

<p>Notwithstanding the plans hereby approved, prior to the commencement of the
relevant part of the development full details of secure, covered cycle parking
(including stands) shall be submitted to, and approved in writing, by the Local
Planning Authority. The cycle facilities shall be implemented in full prior to the first
occupation of the development and retained thereafter
</p><p>REASON: To ensure that a reasonable provision is made within the site for the
parking of cycles/motorcycles in the interest of relieving congestion in surrounding
streets and improving highway conditions in general.<br></p>

<p>All areas labelled as 'biodiversity roof' on the drawings hereby approved shall
not be used for any purpose other than as a means of escape in emergency or for
maintenance of the building. In particular the areas shall not be used as a roof
terrace, balcony or any other amenity area.
</p><p>REASON: To safeguard the amenities of the adjoining premises and the area
generally.<br></p>

<p>The development shall not be undertaken otherwise than in full accordance with the screening details approved for condition 9 under 2023/2355:</p><p>- 2 2 2 7 - P 6 0 5 - S 2 - P 1</p><p>REASON: To ensure that adjoining occupiers would retain an adequate level of
privacy.<br></p>

<p>With the exception of that shown on the drawings hereby approved, required by
condition/s attached to this planning permission, or subsequently approved, no roof
plant, including external enclosures, machinery and other installations shall be
placed upon or attached to the roof or other external surfaces of the building.
</p><p>REASON: To ensure that the external appearance of the building is satisfactory and
does not detract from the character and visual amenity of the area.<br></p>
description: Variation of Condition 2 (Approved drawings), of planning application 2018/4713, dated 18/10/2019. Effect of variation to amend the fenestration to comply with current fire standards.
